pages.text: The gravity duper is a relatively hard to make contraption that uses some misterious properties of end portals in order to duplicate specific blocks.$(br2)It needs to be built with one specific block in mind, and has to be fueled in order to work.

Sadly, the recipe for the block is lost to time, but its pieces may help us find the
solution . . .$(br2)Works with: Sand, Red Sand, Gravel, Pointed Dripstone and all colors of Concrete Powder.
